title: Grace and Justice for a Porn Addict
itunes:author: Guest: Rosie Makinney
itunes:summary:
A small bit of curiosity regarding pornography can lead to a dangerous cycle of addiction. John, Erin and Greg share ways that a wife can show her husband grace, while also not putting up with the problem. Featuring Mrs. Rosie Makinney.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Receive the book "Fight For Love" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-06-23?refcd=1453806

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/grace-and-justice-for-a-porn-addict/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/rescuing-your-marriage-from-pornography-digital-download/?refcd=1453806

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
